title: Monogram M Filigree Aqua and Black Polka Dot 18 x 13 Rectangular Double Applique Small Garden Flag
features: Made of weather resistant nylon fabric; features tight, detailed embroidered stitching sure to draw attention
Garden banner measures approximately 13 x 18 inches. Hardware not included.
Designed with 3-ply construction: Two heavily embroidered panels, sewn back to back with batting between.
Fits on most standard garden poles. Artwork displays the same on both sides of flag
Craftsmanship yeilds rich looking and high end appearance anyone can be proud of
description: Magnolia Lane Double Applique House Flags are among the finest quality flags in the industry, featuring 3-ply construction. This means two heavily embroidered and appliqued flags are sewn together back to back with batting sewn in between. Reinforced and long lasting flags using a 360-denier nylon. The 3-ply construction process yields a rich looking, luxurious flag that offers a very high end appearance that anyone would be proud to display inside or outside their home or place of business. Each unique design is crafted using weather resistant nylon fabric along with tight, detailed embroidered stitching that is sure to draw attention. This flag will fit on any garden pole. Flags size 13” x 18”.
